## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2c139afd44ad0d22c82b3a41db52a6d4a9b736c31f2429694ad6f2d1cb2be9c0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'dummy-loosesight-gc' @ 1.11.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
